channel.title: Operators :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Video Script Boolean Operators (Slide 6) And Let’s take a look at what the Boolean and operator does out in this Venn diagram here we’re going to kind of use these to showcase where the Boolean statements that we’re checking out with the Boolean operator where these statements are actually evaluated to be true. So if we assume that we are two facts here, A and B are both true.
